Combat

Weapon Proficiency: Dagger; Dart; Light Crossbow; Quarterstaff; Sling
Armor: None Shield: None Weapons: Dagger: 1 (+8 1d4+2 R20/60); Dart: 1 (+8 1d4+2 R20/60); Quarterstaff: 1 (+8 1d8+2); Unarmed: 1 (+8 1d1+2)
Combat Notes:
Alert: +5 Initiative; cannot be surprised; no Adv to unseen foes
Constitution Hit Points Adjustment: +40
Strength Attack Adjustment: +2
Strength Damage Adjustment: +2
Great Weapon Master: Bonus attack after crit or reducing foe to 0 HP; trade -5 attack w/heavy weapon for +10 damage
Polearm Master: Bonus attack w/polearm butt inflicts 1d4 HP bludgeoning, OA when foe enters reach
Savage Attacker: Take best of two melee damage rolls 1/tn
Save Proficiency: Intelligence; Wisdom

Save Notes:
Inured To Undeath: Resistance to necrotic damage, immunity to maximum HP reduction
Spell Resistance: Adv on saves vs. spells and resistance to spell damage
Magic
Spell Slots: W0: 5; W1: 4; W2: 3; W3: 3; W4: 3; W5: 3; W6: 2; W7: 2; W8: 1; W9: 1 Attack: W: 8 Spell DC: W: 16
Spells:
Animate Dead (W3 [School Of Necromancy] Necr): R10' Bones or corpse becomes skeleton or zombie, obeys R60' self commands for 1 dy
Arcane Eye (W4 Divi): R30' Self sees through remote invisible eye w/darkvision that moves 30'/rd for conc or 1 hr
Banishment (W4 Abju): R60' Banishes target to home or demiplane (Cha neg) for conc or 1 min
Charm Person (W1 Ench): R30' Target regards you as a friend (Wis neg) for 1 hr or until harmed
Chill Touch (W0 Necr): R120' Ranged spell inflicts 4d8 HP necrotic, undead also suffer Disadv on self attack for 1 rd
Chromatic Orb (W1 Evoc): R90' Ranged spell inflicts 3d8 HP acid, cold, fire, lightning, poison, or energy
Cone Of Cold (W5 Evoc): 60' cone inflicts 8d8 HP cold (Con half)
Dimension Door (W4 Conj): Self and 1 other willing creature teleport up to 500'
Disintegrate (W6 Tran): R60' Target suffers 10d6+40 HP force, dusts if reduced to 0 HP (Dex neg)
Enlarge/Reduce (W2 Tran): R30' Target becomes dbl (Adv on Str, +1d4 weapon damage) or half (Disadv on Str, -1d4 weapon damage) size for conc or 1 min
Friends (W0 Ench): Self gains on Adv on Cha checks w/target for conc or 1 min
Gaseous Form (W3 Tran): Touched creature becomes gaseous for conc or 1 hr
Geas (W5 Ench): R60' Target obeys command (Wis neg) for 30 dy
Grease (W1 Conj): R60' Creatures in 10' sq fall (Dex neg) for 1 min
Invisibility (W2 Illu): Touched becomes invisible for conc or 1 hr or until attacks or casts
Mage Hand (W0 [School Of Transmutation] Conj): R30' Spectral hand performs minor tasks moving up to 10 lb for 1 min
Major Image (W3 Illu): R120' Creates 20' cu sight, sound, and touch illusion for conc or 10 min
Maze (W8 Conj): R60' Target sent to labyrinthine demiplane (DC 20 Int escapes) for conc or 10 min
Mending (W0 Tran): Touch repairs small tear
Minor Illusion (W0 [School Of Illusion] Illu): R30' Creates sound of 1 creature or 5' cu image (Investigation disbelieve) for 1 min
Mirror Image (W2 Illu): 3 self duplicates draw attacks (AC 10) for 1 min
Mordenkainen's Magnificent Mansion (W7 Conj): R300' Creates extradimensional dwelling for 1 dy
Otiluke's Freezing Sphere (W6 Evoc): R300' 60' radius inflicts 10d6 HP cold (Con half), freezes water for 1 min
Phantom Steed (W3 Illu): R30' Self or target rides 100'/rd (13 MPH) for 1 hr
Poison Spray (W0 Conj): R10' Target suffers 4d12 HP poison (Con neg)
Polymorph (W4 [School Of Transmutation] Tran): R60' Transforms target creature (Wis neg) for conc or 1 hr or until reduced to 0 HP
Prismatic Wall (W9 Abju): R60' 90'x30' area blinds w/in 20' for 1 min (Con neg); passers suffer 10d6 HP each fire, acid, lightning, poison, and cold (Dex half), restraint (Dex neg) and then turning to stone (3 Con before 3 fails neg), and blindness (Dex neg) followed by banishment to another plane (Wis neg)
Raise Dead (W5 [School Of Transmutation] Necr): Restores touched 10-day-old corpse to life
Ray Of Sickness (W1 Necr): R60' Target suffers 2d8 HP poison and poisoned 1 rd (Con not poisoned)
Seeming (W5 Illu): R30' Changes appearance of targets (Cha neg) for 8 hr
Shocking Grasp (W0 Evoc): Touched suffers 4d8 HP lightning
Simulacrum (W7 Illu): Creates from snow a friendly duplicate creature w/half the HP of original
Magic Notes:
Greater Portent: Replace roll 3/long rest
Abjuration Savant: Copy abjuration spells into spellbook for half cost
Alter Memories: Target unaware of enchantment, forgets 5 hrs (DC 16 Int neg)
Arcane Recovery: Short rest recovers 10 spell slots 1/dy
Arcane Ward: Abjuration casting creates 42 HP shield around self until long rest
Benign Transposition: R30' Teleport self or swap w/willing creature 1/long rest or conjuration spell casting
Command Undead: R60' Take control of undead target (DC 16 Cha neg (Adv intelligence 8 or higher))
Conjuration Savant: Copy conjuration spells into spellbook for half cost
Divination Savant: Copy divination spells into spellbook for half cost
Durable Summons: Summoned creatures gain +30 temporary HP
Empowered Evocation: +2 HP evocation spell damage
Enchantment Savant: Copy enchantment spells into spellbook for half cost
Evocation Savant: Copy evocation spells into spellbook for half cost
Expert Divination: Casting divination spell restores lower spell slot
Focused Conjuration: Damage cannot break conjuration concentration
Grim Harvest: Regain 2x spell level HP (3x for necromantic spells) when self spell kills
Hypnotic Gaze: R5' Daze target 1/long rest (DC 16 Wis neg)
Illusion Savant: Copy illusion spells into spellbook for half cost
Illusory Reality: Make object in self illusion real for 1 min
Illusory Self: Use Reaction to cause foe miss 1/short rest
Improved Abjuration: Add Proficiency Bonus to abjuration spell ability checks
Improved Minor Illusion: Know Minor Illusion, effect includes both sound and image
Instinctive Charm: Redirect self foe attack to closest creature (DC 16 Wis neg until long rest)
Malleable Illusions: Modify cast illusions throughout duration
Master Transmuter: Destroy transmuter's stone to transmute 5' cu, remove curses, diseases, and poisons, cast Raise Dead, or restore youth
Minor Alchemy: Transform 1' cu/10 min effort for 1 hr
Minor Conjuration: R10' Create 3' cu, 10 lb object for 1 hr
Necromancy Savant: Copy necromancy spells into spellbook for half cost
Overchannel: Evocation spell up to level 5 inflicts maximum damage, self takes 2+d12 HP necrotic damage after first time/long rest
Portent: Replace visible creature's attack, ability, or saving throw 3/long rest
Potent Cantrip: Target takes half damage on cantrip save
Projected Ward: R30' Use Arcane Ward to absorb damage to others
Ritual Casting: Cast known spell as ritual
Sculpt Spells: Protect spell level + 1 targets from self evocation spell effects
Shapechanger: Know Polymorph, transform self into CR 1 creature 1/short rest
Signature Spells: Cast 2 chosen W3 spells 1/short rest
Spell Mastery: Cast chosen W1 spell W2 spell at will
Split Enchantment: Add second target to enchantment spell
The Third Eye: Use action to gain 60' darkvision, 60' ethereal sight, universal language comprehension, or 10' invisibility sight
Transmutation Savant: Copy transmutation spells into spellbook for half cost
Transmuter's Stone: Stone gives 60' darkvision, +10' speed, proficiency in constitution, or resistance to chosen energy damage; change effect when casting transmutation spell
Undead Thralls: Know Animate Dead, casting animates additional corpse and gives +20 HP and +6 damage
War Caster: Adv on concentration to maintain spell, cast when holding shield and/or weapon, use Reaction to cast as OA
